name: Haunted Harvest 3
description:
After a reasonable attempt to stop the crows from eating all his crops goes slightly wrong, a farmer has to sneak into his own field to harvest enough crops to get his murderous scarecrow fixed.

Haunted Harvest 3 is a stealth game about hiding among the crops in your field as you try and harvest enough of them to make some money at the market. Upgrade yourself and your enemy as you try and make it smart enough to recognize you as a friend.

Controls

WASD or arrows to move

Hold Space to harvest crops

Team

Miles - Design, Programming, Art

Ethan - Music, Sounds

Tools used
* Unity

* Aesprite

* Ableton Live 10

* Sounds designed in Vital

* Font: Plasma Drip - 1001fonts.com
